ROOT.STRING: Select this citizen by left-clicking on him.
Left click on the target marker
Select more than one Citizen using a drag-select box.
Order the group to build a military building by clicking the Military Building button.
Order your citizens to build a Siege Factory
Select Catapult at the siege factory
Select Build Catapult again to add another catapult to the queue
Left click near Ethandun on the minimap to zoom to the city.
Left click near Carlisle on the minimap to view the city
Select all your military units using a left-click drag box.
Right click to have your units defeat the Viking army!
Select your units and right click on Ethandun to retake the city.
